column4: hi all. I installed Breezy preview on my laptop (Radeon 9700 video card), I followed the instructions on wiki.ubuntu.com to install fglrx driver, but still no 3d acceleration. Xorg's log says it can't initialize DRI. Any suggestion, please?
, nalioth : sorry, I used it some months ago and it worked more or less perfectly
its a bad resource , believe me
: ok, I won't use it with Breezy when it will be released. I am trying to get ATI 3d support, can you please suggest me some useful links to manage ATI and multimedia (mp3 and dvd, mostly) support?
